definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[עלם]] (√ of foll.; perh. orig. be mature (sexually); Aram. [[עֲלֵם]] be strong, 9alem rejuvenate (certainly denom.), Ar. galima be lustful (id.); cf. Sab. [[עַלם]], [[עַלמן]] young man CIS:iv. pp. 30, 42, Ar. gula0mun id.; Ph. [[עלמת]] girl; Nab. Palm. [[עלם]], [[עלים]] slave, Palm. fpl. harlots; Targum [[עוּלֵּימָא]], [[עוּלֵּמְתָּא]] Syr. 9laymo0, 9laymto0 young man, young woman).
